project-challenges: Well, I didn't know much about the software, so it took some reading of documentation and a lot of tutorials.
project-future-plans: I'll probably write out more features than even the reference version has, and then move on to a totally original project!
project-purpose: Plays like a pretty new and simple version of the original Mario
project-accomplishments: It's crash free and a path to the creation of new software
project-subtitle: A clone of the famous nintendo Mario game I made with some help from Brent Aureli to learn about libgdx
